column4: :'( I still do not have a User List at GDM login prompt. Does anyone have any ideas? I have set the Login Window Manager's Local tab 'Style' setting to Themed with face browser.
:'( I have also restarted my computer. This has been like this for the last three days
make sure the Theme: is set to selected only
yes it does, if Random from selected is selected, then your theme wont be used
can you screenshot your login window preferences screen for us?
does that theme support face browsing?
tbh it doesnt look like it
YES. I have tried the ones that come with ubuntu also. I am not new to themes for the GDM. I just have never had this issue.
and do the other themes with face browser work?
hmm is your system fully up to date?
yes, up to date. I have even used Human List.
with Human List the area that should have the user list has only a white box
you might want to take it to launchpad :/
